ing: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
n: Golfer's Chicken in the Slow Cooker
des: "This is a quick-to-prepare and easy recipe my husband acquired from a friend. We've served it over rice and over fresh steamed vegetables. The sauce is unexpectedly tasty. Serve over rice."
ins:
Put chicken breasts into a slow cooker crock.
Stir apricot preserves, Russian-style salad dressing, and onion soup mix together in a bowl; pour into slow cooker crock, assuring chicken is completely covered.
Cook on Low for 8 to 10 hours.
